name: Criminals Transport 2019
description:
Criminals Transport 2019 is a realistic transport Game. Take criminal mafia from City Jail and transport them to the jail within the mountain. For training new military drivers in the us army training school in mountai areas. You have to transport army hard time prisoners and Special Forces commandos to army training Camp for training different drills and activities. Fasten your seatbelt, grab the steering of your armybus and drive army training bus , truck on offroad tracks, hill climb, this track is very dangerous for driving long vehicles and intense weather make it more challenging and difficult to drive army loaded bus on curvy, slippery and hardtime off-road tracks. Prepare yourself for exciting and daring for free armybus coach driving game.
Features:
- Marvelous prisoner transport experience
- Smooth controls
- Superb 3D graphics
- Amazing bus simulation experience
- Gang game that you can go to jail.
